name: tm17
effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Negates all damage,
but may fail if used
in succession.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Negates all damage,
but may fail if used
in succession.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Enables the user to
evade all attacks.
It may fail if used
in succession.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon
is dragged out.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from special attacks for five turns.
